name: Alchemize
description:
An abstract strategy board game for two players, originally made for Ludum Dare 42 - "Running Out of Space".
Now with the ability to play vs AI!

Instructions

Players are Blue and Red. Every turn , a player places a potion of their color on the board.
A tile touching two different colors will produce a gem in the color of the last potion placed.
A tile touching two potions of the same color will collapse.
The player with most gems is the winner.

Enjoy!
